item.title: EzProtocol
item.description: ezProtocol is a program designed for Opentrons OT2 robot. It handles writing detailed script for you so you can spend your time on things that matter. It can be found here. ezProtocol can read protocol file in a format designed to be easy but versatile. See here on how to make a protocol file. Requirements ezProtocol relies on below packages: - PyYAML - Pandas - python-frontmatter - regex - opentrons
